resources.string: Gonuts with Donuts is a Sri Lanka dedicated food outlets for specialize manufacturing of Donuts in Colombo, Sri Lanka.

These soft, cake-like Strawberry Frosted Donuts feature fresh strawberries and a delicious fresh strawberry glaze frosting. Pretty enough for company and the perfect treat to satisfy your sweet tooth.
Order your favourite donuts from here
These Baked Strawberry\n Donuts are filled with\n fresh strawberries...
